__TOC__

Every Member is invited to come to Binghamton to set the direction for the Team in 2008. We will discuss how we will accomplish our advocacy and support of Ubuntu. We will be able to put faces to the online nicknames.

WHEN: Nov 11th, 2007 2pm to 5pm eastern

WHERE: Binghamton University, Engineering Building, EBQ23

WHAT:
* Set Goals and Objectives for 2008
* Develop strategies for growth
* Network with other Regional Leaders

We are looking for people to come and share their ideas for the Team, Linux, Ubuntu in New York. People are welcome to just come and share their experiences and network amongst themselves. Our goal for this meeting is to help shape our future and people of all skill levels are encouraged to participate in the process.

Linux enthusiasts, LUGs, LoCos and other groups/individuals from throughout the state and its neighbors are welcome to participate in our meeting. As is the Ubuntu way, we want to be inclusive of all Linux and Ubuntu users. 

It is strongly encouraged that you send an email to  or RSVP here, so we can negotiate better terms with the location. Members can also email the list at  to inquire about carpooling with other members.
